statuses.check-app: Please follow instructions in the {{appName}} app.

xaman.open-app: Open the Xaman app on your phone.
xaman.change-settings: Go to settings and choose a testnet node.
xaman.scan-qr: Scan this QR code with the Xaman app.

statuses.check-push: Check a push notification on your mobile.
statuses.expired: The QR code is expired, request a new one.

confirm.nft-transfer: I'm offering that NFT for FREE to the Destination account, <2>the destination account would need to accept the NFT transfer</2>.
confirm.nft-accept-offer: I admit that {{webSiteName}} gives me access to a decentralised marketplace, and it cannot verify or guarantee the authenticity and legitimacy of any NFTs. I confirm that I've read the <4>Terms and conditions</4>, and I agree with all the terms to buy, sell or use any NFTs on {{webSiteName}}.
confirm.nft-create-sell-offer: I understand, once my listing is signed, the NFT can be purchased instantly.
confirm.nft-burn: I understand that NFT will be permanently deleted, meaning, it can no longer be owned, transferred, purchased, or sold. This action can not be undone.

status.awaiting-crawler: Awaiting for crawler to update the data
status.awaiting-broker: Awaiting for {{serviceName}} to accept the offer
status.failed-broker: Failed to notify {{serviceName}} about the offer. You can cancel it.

nft-offer.counteroffer: You're making a counteroffer, which should to be accepted automatically within 20 seconds. If it's not accepted you can cancel it at any time.

cookie.we-use-cookie: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience on our site.

home.title: The best {{nativeCurrency}} Explorer | Scan {{nativeCurrency}} Ledger | {{explorerName}} Explorer
home.description: Bithomp - The best {{nativeCurrency}} Explorer. Track Ripple USD (RLUSD), {{nativeCurrency}} accounts. Search {{nativeCurrency}} transactions. NFTs on {{explorerName}}. Validators, Amendments and much more.
home.search-placeholder: Search by Address / Transaction / NFT / Username / PayString / Offer / Currency hash

whales.header: The most significant transactions for the last 24 hours

nft-statistics.text0:
The information is a bit outdated, we need to catch up with <1>{{lag}} ledgers.
The data is provided for the ledger #{{crawlerIndex}}, ({{crawlerTime}}).
The last validated ledger is #{{currentLedgerIndex}}, ({{currentLedgerTime}}).
nft-statistics.only-xrp: Can be sold only for XRP

alerts.text0: Get notified when {{ nativeCurrency }}/USD or {{ nativeCurrency }}/BTC market price by <6>{{linkText}}</6> changes for more than 5% within an hour or more than 10% within a day.
alerts.text1: Follow the Telegram channel: <1>bithomp</1> or the X account: <4>XRP_PriceAlerts</4>.

genesis.text0: The ledger <1>32570</1> is the earliest ledger available, approximately the first week of XRPL history, <3>ledgers 1 through 32569 were lost due to a mishap in 2012</3>.
genesis.ledger-continue: Because the XRP Ledger's state is recorded in every ledger version, the ledger can continue without the missing history.

developer.description: Project description and API use details:
developer.success: Thank you. The API token was sent to your e-mail.

error.description-empty: Please add a description of your project.
error.description-invalid: Please write a detailed description of your project.

press: This is the official logo for Bithomp to use by media and press professionals for print and web (svg, png, eps, pdf, for dark and light backgrounds). For media inquiries, please <2>contact us</2>.

page-not-found.text: Click <2>here</2> to check our landing page.

general.login-to-bithomp-pro: Loading more data is available to <2>logged-in</2> Bithomp Pro subscribers.
general.renew-bithomp-pro: Your Bithomp Pro subscription has expired. <1>Renew your subscription</1>.
general.change-filters: Try adjusting the filters to see results that match your search!

error.domain-invalid: Please enter a valid web domain.
error.email-invalid: Please enter a valid e-mail address.

placeholder.destination-tag: Enter the Destination tag (if it is required)

error.payment-partly: Please send the rest of the amount, so far we only received {{received}} {{currency}} when {{required}} {{currency}} is required.
error.Network Error: It seems there is no internet connection ;(
error.Request failed with status code 522: The server is currently unreachable, try again later.
error.Request failed with status code 429: You are sending us too many requests, try later!
error.Request failed with status code 404: Such API call is not allowed on that network
error.Request failed with status code 403: It seems you're logged out, please log in again
error.Request failed with status code 408: The request has timed out. Try changing your filters or try again later.
error.read ECONNRESET: The request timed out. Try changing your filters or try again later.

address.invalid_signature_address: Invalid signature address. Make sure that you sign with the correct address.
address.limit_reached: You can not add more addesses, you've reached the limit.
address.not_activated: The address is not activated yet.

blob.invalid_signature_address: You need to sign the message with the address that you're trying to add.

error-api.search is too short: The name to search is too short
error-api.Token information is not found: We couldn't find any information for that ID
error-api.No nfts information is found: Sorry, an error occured, please to search for somethig else.
